description: Degrees of fundamental invariants of Weyl group W(E_8).
comments: a(n) - 1 is the n-th number < 30 that is relatively prime to 30. [From _Jonathan Sondow_, Apr 16 2009]
references: H. S. M. Coxeter and W. O. J. Moser, Generators and Relations for Discrete Groups, 4th ed., Springer-Verlag, NY, reprinted 1984, p. 141.
formula: a(n) = Prime(n+2) + 1, for n = 2, 3, ..., 8. [From _Jonathan Sondow_, Apr 16 2009]
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
